column4: wow with wine is hardlocking my computer and causing it to crash #winehq says its an ubuntu specific issue, anyone got some information?
wow with wine is hardlocking my computer and causing it to crash #winehq says its an ubuntu specific issue, anyone got some information?
is it a 3d application?
do you have your drivers set up for 3d?
yes i do, fglrx
fglrx doesn't do DRI, which may be why you're locking up.
it doesnt do composite w/ dri
it does DRI
i have 3d acceleration
wine hq claims its my drivers as no app should be able to hardlock my computer.....
the wine guys are weird... their software is just as prone to lock your computer as any other software.
i just thought it was a driver issue because APPDb says it works flawlessly in feisty
what are you trying to run in wine first of all?
WoW, has worked many times pre-feisty
know anyone running fglrx drivers having issues, i heard the newest kernel has issues with fglrx
i don't know, i stopped using fglrx once the radeon drivers were improved.
do they support the x1000 series yet
if you're relatively sure it's not a wine problem, it most likely has something to do with your vid card.
used to work fine in edgy XD
i dunno i use radeon 9550
yep my card is too new /cry
